title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: This bug report pertains to the behavior of the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu within the Java perspective.
OB: The bug report lacks a clear description of the observed behavior and expected behavior. It does not provide sufficient details to understand the issue.
EB: The expected behavior mentioned is 'No need for a manual build if the build is already done, automatically.' This is a statement of expected behavior, but it needs to be connected to the observed issue.
SR: There are no steps to reproduce provided, making it unclear how to encounter the problem.
